text: @TheRickWilson Remember just 4 weeks ago, after being repeatedly briefed about the severity of Coronavirus, Trump was on a 3 day golf vacation and threw a lavish party at his private club. He wasted weeks and 335,803 got the virus and he let 9,598 people die. Trump should be FIRED.
